about_the_game:
This is the “Shrink Rooms” demo. Players can try out typical early - game level puzzles and embark on an intense puzzle - solving escape journey, fully engaging their brainpower!

Unique Demo Version

The demo version will open more than 30 levels of game content.

In the demo, players can experience the main puzzles of the first chapter of the game and the representative levels of subsequent chapters.

New Level Mechanism

New level mechanisms such as "Slime" and "Portal" will appear.

Advanced Puzzles Rack Your Brains

Are you still not satisfied with the basic puzzles? Let's increase the difficulty level for you!

Round-based Sokoban & Escape From Danger

The basic gameplay of Shrink Rooms is to solve puzzles by pushing boxes.

Different from other puzzle games, the walls of the level's room will contract inward at the end of each round. You must accurately plan the number of steps for pushing boxes to escape from the secret room, so as to avoid being crushed into a puddle of flesh by the walls.

Massive Mechanisms & Creative Combinations

There are various interesting mechanisms in the shrink rooms. The characteristics of different mechanisms are combined to generate many puzzles with rich variations and high difficulty. Welcome to challenge!

Flexible Selection & Free Exploration

You can move freely in the selection scene. You can choose easier puzzles to continue the game, or try to solve all difficult puzzles.

At the same time, in addition to solving puzzles, you can also explore and collect virtual exhibits and find hidden levels in the scene to explore different fun.

short_description: Shrink Rooms demo is a round-based puzzle game. You need to solve a series of pushing box puzzles within a limited number of steps to escape, otherwise you will be crushed into a puddle of meat by shrinking walls of the level.
